title: Spaghetti Bolognese
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with rich, meaty sauce.
instructions: Fry onion and garlic until soft.
Add minced beef and cook until browned.
Stir in tomatoes and simmer for 20 minutes.

title: Chicken Curry
summary: Spicy and creamy curry with tender chicken pieces.
instructions: Add chicken and cook until browned.
Stir in curry powder and mix well.
Pour in coconut milk and simmer 25 minutes.
